alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 21 at 6:09AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...THE FOREST SERVICE UTAH AVALANCHE CENTER IN SALT LAKE CITY HAS ISSUED A BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WARNING WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MST TODAY TO 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...The avalanche danger for the warning area will rise to high later today. * WHERE...The Bear River Range in northern Utah. * WHEN...From 6AM MST this morning to 6AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Heavy snowfall and drifting snow will overload slopes with widespread buried persistent weak layers and cause the avalanche danger to rise rapidly. The storm will create high avalanche danger in the backcountry today, with both natural and human-triggered avalanches becoming likely. Stay off of and out from under drifted slopes steeper than 30 degrees. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Stay off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees. Backcountry travelers should consult www.utahavalanchecenter.org or call 1-888-999-4019 for more detailed information. This Warning does not apply to ski areas where avalanche hazard reduction measures are performed.
